summary: This document contains a report of incoming and outgoing wires, checks, and ACH transactions dated June 16, 2017. It details various financial transactions involving multiple individuals and entities, primarily focusing on accounts held at The Bank of N.T. Butterfield and Deutsche Bank Trust Company. The document highlights significant monetary amounts and beneficiaries associated with these transactions.
